mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_code_id AS emp_code_id, e.emp_name AS emp_name, e.emp_email AS emp_email, d.dept_id AS dept_id, d.dept_name AS dept_name, j.job_id AS job_id, j.job_name AS job_name FROM employee e left join department d on e.emp_dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN job j ON e.emp_job_id = j.job_id
